ie.gmit.dip

Class WordEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.dip.WordEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Wordable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BookParser

    public class WordEntry
extends java.lang.Object
implements Wordable
    Version:
    1.0 WordEntry class implements the Wordable interface Contains the getters and setters to get and set the definition and the page number for each word in the book
    Author:
    Hugh Moran
